ygData.subject: Re: compilation problem

--- In cantera@yahoogroups.com, David Goodwin <dgoodwin@c...> wrote:
>
> I'=
m not sure if this is the problem, but try setting USE_SUNDIALS to  
> 'n' =
in 'configure' and then re-run 'configure'.  This should be the  
> default=
, but in the latest version of 'configure' in CVS, it is set to  
> 'y'.

I=
 tried it but didn't work.
I manage to compile the same sources on another =
machine (gcc version
3.2.1 20030202 (Red Hat Linux 8.0 3.2.1-7) on 32bit In=
tel)

on 64bit AMD.
